channel.title: Connection lost
channel.description: Well, when i log in to anything it loads then i log in and get "connection lost-please wait. Then it does thatuntil it says loading-please wait over the connection message, and eventually i get logged out. Why? I know you have lots of questions to answer, but please bear with me.
